memories.name: Learning from Emily
memories.episode_body: Emily is great mentor for React patterns and architecture. Learning about component composition and state management from her code reviews. Want to work on more complex features.

memories.name: Frank Johnson - Associate Frontend Engineer
memories.episode_body: Frank Johnson is Associate Frontend Engineer on Frontend Team at TechFlow Solutions. Developing expertise in React, component development, and modern frontend tooling. 1.5 years frontend experience. Eager to learn from senior team members.

memories.name: Component Development Work
memories.episode_body: Built reusable form components: TextInput, Select, Checkbox, RadioGroup. Components support validation states, error messages, disabled states, and accessibility features. Used by checkout flow and other forms across application.
